original_title: Rio das Almas e Negras Memórias
overview: Based on real facts, the film reveals veiled memories of the suffering of blacks enslaved on the banks of the Rio das Almas in Pirenopolis-GO. With the exploration of gold mining, the Frota family gets rich at the expense of tax evasion and human sacrifices.
title: Rio das Almas e Negras Memórias
